About

Bill is an affluent Enterprise Cloud Architect. Based out of St. Louis, he has traveled the country physically and virtually delivering on some of the most interesting cloud engagements to date. These engagements include a wide range of industries, complexities, and unique business conditions.

He specializes in organizational architecture around Azure, Office 365, and traditional infrastructure. His values exhibit persistent studies as a scholar of the industry and deliverance methodology, focusing on accountability, clarity, and the absolute best practices.

Bill's experience ranges from Fortune 20 enterprises to privately-owned, midwestern SMBs.
